document_data.name: Fellowship of Farfaring
document_data.mainbody: The '''Fellowship of Farfaring''' was an adventuring organization that consisted of multiple chapters in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: The [[Waterdeep]] chapter of the Fellowship of Farfaring was opened in the late 15{{th}} century DR. The organization advertised itself via street criers in the city's [[Waterdeep/Dock Ward|Dock Ward]], offering its new members blazing new trails, seeing [[Toril]], and getting rich doing so.
